title: Siege Warfare - ICYFAR - G4 The PiG Daily #154
excerpt: THIS WEEKS ICYFAR Challenge: "Feinting Attacks" - A feint is where you give the impression of attacking in one place where its fake or just a small distraction from the real thrust of your attack. Examples: Using empty drops or hallucinations to pull your opponent out of position!  Send submissions
